InitialFeedbackHistory: 03/01/2023 Please note that FWO asks for EOS projects to include RDM for the entire project: see www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan "the DMP should cover the entire EOS project, not only the [REDACTED] part". Please make sure to include this in your final DMP that FWO expects as part of the final report; you can submit an updated DMP already as intermediate.
label: good with suggestions
